lines.text: Mayonnaise is more than sandwich spread. It's in our hearts and in our heads.
There, I was visited by a bizarre, strange imp of a man.
While we're gone, I want you to sweep the chimney!
And finish up that radiation research in the basement!
It's a washer! It's a dryer! It's a reason for living!
There's a comedy club in town.
Yeah, I know. Catch a Rising Jester.
